pages.text:
Private Events
Aspirations Winery is a unique and expertly designed winery space and event venue in Clearwater, Florida, ideal for all types of events and celebrations. Those wishing to have an event in a stylish, relaxed setting will adore Aspirations’ offerings. The highly customizable trio of spaces can accommodate up to 200 guests but is also ideal for smaller private parties. The experienced team is happy to collaborate on each detail of the day to ensure the event flows seamlessly.
You can provide your own entertainment, catering, and event staging, or the Aspirations team can help to arrange options using trusted partners. The location boasts plenty of FREE parking, is centrally located, and does not require a minimum beverage spend.
In addition to being a unique venue, Aspirations Winery is a functioning winery. With a wide selection of on-site, clean Florida wine offerings, specialty sangrias, and local craft beers, ciders, and seltzers, the Aspirations team will help to pair drinks to match any event. Custom-labeled wine can also be created specifically for your event.
If you are looking for a unique venue that will wow your guests, the Aspirations Winery team encourages you to reach out for a custom quote and looks forward to discussing your exciting plans.
Tasting Room – $240
Tap Room – $300 – $400
Event Room – $450 – $1,600
Entire Winery – $1,800 – $2,600
Additional Costs
Gratuity and Cleaning fees are additional
A 50% deposit is required to book the space, and the balance is due 30 days
before the event.
You must cancel, in writing, 30 days before the event to receive a full refund.
We can provide anything from basic meat, cheese, and cracker plates to charcuterie grazing
We provide discounted pricing for Not For Profit fundraisers
Come Visit Us

Closed Monday & Tuesday
(Private Events can be done outside these hours and on Monday or Tuesday)
Enjoy wine samples, flights, and by the glass!
We also have local craft beers and our specialty sangria's on tap (with some domestics), ciders, seltzers, cocktails and more!
We serve delious flatbreads, charcuterie and more!

About Aspirations
Making Wine Since
2010
Established by Robin & Bill Linville in October 2010, Aspirations Winery embodies a dream realized in Clearwater, Florida.
Bill, a former banker with seven years in the industry and a Navy veteran of the Presidential Honor Guard, teamed up with his graphic artist wife, Robin, to bring their shared vision to life. Their journey began after years of juggling multiple jobs, seeking the right business venture to call their own.
Their quest led them to a serendipitous discovery: the world of “clean” wine. Bill, plagued by wine-induced headaches and suspecting a sulfite allergy, learned about the necessity of additives and preservatives in wine aging. Disheartened by the lack of transparency in labeling and the prevalence of sulfites in wines, they resolved to offer a healthier alternative to their community.
Having experienced the refreshing absence of side effects, including “hangovers,” from clean wine, they were inspired to share this revelation with others. Thus, Aspirations Winery was born, initially nestled in Temple Terrace near USF before finding its permanent home in Clearwater in December 2011.
The Art of Wine Making
Today, Aspirations Winery boasts a collection of over 35 low-sulfite wines, ranging from dry reds and whites to fruit-infused varieties, specialty sangrias, and decadent dessert wines. Their inviting location features a wine tasting room, tap room, and ample event space, inviting visitors to experience the essence of Clearwater’s thriving wine culture firsthand. Come discover why Aspirations Winery is a must-visit destination in Clearwater, where headaches are truly not included.
TOURS AND TASTINGS
Tours and Tastings are by Appointment Only!
Come in for a visit and see why we are the top-rated winery in Florida!
#1 in 2023
by Choice Wineries
Discover why Aspirations Winery has consistently garnered top honors in Florida’s wine scene. Yelp crowned us the #1 rated winery in the state in 2022, while House Beautiful Magazine bestowed upon us the title of the best winery in Florida back in 2018. TripAdvisor consistently ranks us among Clearwater’s Top Attractions, and we’ve clinched the #1 winery spot in Florida for three consecutive years: 2018, 2022, and 2023. Don’t miss our acclaimed Tour and Tasting Experience, hailed as a “must-do” activity in Clearwater by TripAdvisor. Gather your friends and reserve your spot today to indulge in our award-winning offerings!
SCHEDULE A TOUR AND TASTING
Do I Need a Reservation to Visit?
No, you can visit anytime during our tasting room hours and enjoy samples, flights, wine by the glass, local beers, cider and more.
Do You Serve Food?
Click here to see our menu!
We always have a fine selection of different meats, cheeses and more for you to enjoy and create your own charcuterie or have us make a grazing charcuterie for your group.
Is There a Vineyard on Site?
No, we are a micro-winery and all our wines are made on site from juice we purchase on the open market.
Come Visit Us

EVENTS
& ENTERTAINMENT
Our calendar boasts a diverse array of events designed to delight the senses and create lasting memories. From unique wine tastings to the laid-back charm of Wine Down Wednesdays, flatbread Fridays, Wine-O Bingo, crafting classes and much more, there’s something for everyone to savor at Aspirations Winery. Join us as we celebrate the fusion of culture, community, and fine wine in a setting that embodies the essence of Florida’s Gulf Coast.
CLICK TO SEE OUR EVENTS ON EVENTBRITE
